text: Ferdinand I (19 April 1793 – 29 June 1875) was Emperor of Austria from March 1835 until his abdication in December 1848. He was also King of Hungary, Croatia and Bohemia (as Ferdinand V), King of Lombardy–Venetia and holder of many other lesser titles. == References == Category:1793 births Category:1875 deaths Category:Emperors of Austria
title: Ferdinand I of Austria
